Articles.Content:
I built about six different spaceplanes in 1.0.5 Career, trying to build one without the advantage of RAPIER engines. None of them could reach orbit. Then I built the Star Quake, and found that it could reach orbit with plenty of fuel to spare. I use it as a surface-to-LKO lifeboat and personnel transport. Right now, I don't have any craft that might possibly need more than three Kerbals, so this is great.

Google Drive Download

 

I cpouldn't find any other non-RAPIER SSTOs for 1.0.5 on the Internet, so hopefully this will help out anyone with a similar problem.

Edited January 6, 2016 by RedDwarfIV
